1682670.name: Hungaz: Epic Minigames
1682670.description:
You and up to 70 players compete in epic battle royale matches, finding a way through a three-dimensional playing field, where you’ll need to jump, grab, dive, and climb to survive. Test your skills in randomly selected mini-games while battling the other survivors while trying to qualify for subsequent rounds.
Play tag with your competitors, be the first on the finish line, or work as a team in the team challenges, avoiding dangerous obstacles while navigating the complex maps.

Can you outlast your competitors, or will you be eliminated?

The aim is to qualify for subsequent rounds by completing each randomly selected mini-games. Specific mini-games involve running towards a finish line at the end of the map playing tag with other players, while others add elements of teamwork. On every mini-game, obstacles appear around the map for added complexity.
Players who are too slow or fail specific mini-game requirements are eliminated. In the final round, the remaining few players compete in a final match with a randomized mini-game designed for a smaller player size. The winner of the game is the last player standing.
